name: Purchase Receipt Rejected items notification
script:
rejected_items = [] for item in doc.items: if item.rejected_qty > 0: item_str = str(item.item_code + ' : ' + item.item_name) rejected_items.append(item_str) if len(rejected_items) != 0: content = """

Purchase Receipt

Purchase Receipt Details:

Purchase Receipt Rejected Items {name}
Supplier Name {customer_name}
Date {due_date}
View Document in ERPNext Click to view document
Note This is a system generated email, please don't reply to this message.
""".format(name=doc.name, customer_name=doc.supplier, due_date=frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get_formatted('posting_date'), "dd-mm-yyyy"), link=frappe.utils.get_url_to_form(doc.doctype, doc.name)) query = """select distinct r.parent from `tabHas Role` r, `tabUser` p where p.name = r.parent and p.enabled = 1 and p.docstatus < 2 and r.role in ('Accounts Manager', 'Purchase Manager', 'HQ') and p.name not in ('Administrator', 'All', 'Guest')""" email_list = frappe.db.sql_list(query) try: make(content=content, subject=f'Rejected Items in {doc.name}', send_email=True, recipients=email_list) except: frappe.msgprint('Could not send email')
